official-title.#text:
To amend part Q of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize
			 grant funds to be used for the Troops-to-Cops Program.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Veterans Involved in Police Services Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Veterans Involved in Police Services Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1701(b) of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968/s:1701/ss:b
Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968/s:1701/ss:b/p:1..17
Veterans Involved in Police Services Act of 2014/p:1/ss:b/p:1/sp:A..Q
Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968/p:1701/ss:b/p:1/sp:A
Veterans Involved in Police Services Act of 2014/s:2/p:1
Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968/s:1701/ss:b/p:1
Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968/s:1701/ss:b/p:1/sp:Q
Veterans Involved in Police Services Act of 2014/s:2/p:1
Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968/s:1701/ss:b/p:1/sp:A..P

text.#text: by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

short-title.#tail: , in addition to the purposes described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Veterans Involved in Police Services Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Veterans Involved in Police Services Act of 2014
Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968/s:1701/ss:b/p:1

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may be
			 used to hire former members of the Armed Forces (and to pay the full
			 salary of such former members) to serve as career law enforcement officers
			 for deployment in community-oriented policing, particularly in
			 jurisdictions in which the violent crime rate is higher than the national
			 violent crime rate, according to the uniform crime report compiled by the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968/s:1701/ss:a

text.#text: For grants made during the 3-year period beginning on the date of enactment of the

quote.#tail:
means a member of the Armed Forces of the United States who has been honorably discharged from the
			 Armed Forces of the United States.
quote.#text: former member of the Armed Forces

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4769 IH: Veterans Involved in Police Services Act of 2014
